  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92198</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Increasing gas pressure using force</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zunehmender Gasdruck, Kraft aufwendend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pression de gaz croissante en utilisant la force</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pressão de gás crescente usando a força</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pressione del gas aumentante usando forza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να αυξήσει αέριο την πίεση που χρησιμοποιεί τη 
δύναμη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presión de gas de aumento usando la fuerza</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that the gas pressure is increased by squeezing the container.  The increase in pressure is caused by the more frequent collision between the gas particles and the piston.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">collisions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">piston</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß der Gasdruck durch 
das Zusammendrücken des Behälters erhöht wird. Die Zunahme 
des Drucks wird durch den häufigeren Zusammenstoß zwischen den 
Gaspartikeln und dem Kolben verursacht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve que la pression de gaz est 
augmentée en serrant le récipient. L'augmentation de la 
pression est provoquée par la collision plus fréquente entre les 
particules de gaz et le piston.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que a pressão de gás está
aumentada espremendo o recipiente. O aumento na pressão é 
causado pela colisão mais freqüente entre as partículas do gás e o
pistão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che la pressione del gas è 
aumentata comprimendo il contenitore. L'aumento nella pressione 
è causato dallo scontro più frequente fra le particelle del gas ed 
il pistone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι η αέριο πίεση 
αυξάνεται με τη συμπίεση του εμπορευματοκιβωτίου. Η αύξηση 
στην πίεση προκαλείται από τη συχνότερη σύγκρουση μεταξύ των 
αέριο μορίων και του εμβόλου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que la presión de gas es 
aumentada exprimiendo el envase. El aumento en la presión es 
causado por la colisión más frecuente entre las partículas del gas 
y el pistón.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenstöße</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gasdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kolben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">air</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
